WorkItem.Description: Following the naming of the js file, I would suggest renaming rateit.css to jquery.rateit.css

Comments.Message:
You are right about the naming convention. 

I'm just a bit hesitant performing this change right now, since it is breaking change, and the low severity of the issue does not justify the breaking impact it has.

I do think when other breaking changes come out, I will add this one as well.

What is your opinion?
Totally agree. This can wait for v2.
